Package pages.staffPages.admin

package pages.staffPages.admin
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pages.staffPages
     
    pages.staffPages.manager
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAccessPage
    This class is the page that the admin will see after logging in This page facilitates the admin's access to the system The admin can manage staff, branches, and payment methods
    AdminManageBranchPage
    This page allows the admin to manage branches The admin can open/enable a branch and close/disable a branch
    AdminManagePaymentPage
    This page allows the admin to manage payment methods The admin can view all payment methods, enable a payment method, and disable a payment method
    AdminManageStaffPage
    The AdminManageStaffPage class is a page that allows the admin to manage staff members The admin can view all staff members, fire staff members, hire staff members, and promote staff members The admin can also go back to the AdminAccessPage
